sections.comments: Course is delivered entirely online via UBC Canvas.  To access the course module, go to www.canvas.ubc.caRegistration restricted to SPPH MSc, MHSc and PhD students. Other students please contact the instructor for permission to register, then forward that permission to spph.graduate-programs@ubc.ca
